headline: Progressive Reports October 2025 Results
summary: MAYFIELD VILLAGE, OHIO, Nov. 19, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) today reported the following results for the month ended October 31, 2025: October(millions, except per share amounts and ratios; unaudited) 2025 2024 ChangeNet premiums written$ 7,002 $ 6,578 6 %Net premiums earned$ 7,078 $ 6,387 11 %Net income$ 846 $ 408 107 %Per share available to common shareholders$ 1.44 $ 0.69 107 %Total pretax net realized gains (losses) on securities$ 57 $ (88) (165)%Combined

raw.headline: Progressive Reports October 2025 Results
raw.summary: MAYFIELD VILLAGE, OHIO, Nov. 19, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) today reported the following results for the month ended October 31, 2025: October(millions, except per share amounts and ratios; unaudited) 2025 2024 ChangeNet premiums written$ 7,002 $ 6,578 6 %Net premiums earned$ 7,078 $ 6,387 11 %Net income$ 846 $ 408 107 %Per share available to common shareholders$ 1.44 $ 0.69 107 %Total pretax net realized gains (losses) on securities$ 57 $ (88) (165)%Combined

headline: 3 Reasons Investors Love Progressive (PGR)
summary: Progressive’s stock price has taken a beating over the past six months, shedding 22.5% of its value and falling to $223.29 per share. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
